Topic.Title: Possible MSM interview with DHS Secretary:

Message.Msg: Since you asked, I do spend a good bit of my day reading prominent news sources: NY Times AP Washington Post Wall Street Journal Forbes and others I also watch: C-SPAN CNN MSNBC PBS and others As far as this story is concerned, I found the following interesting: o A story titled "Let's hope the Boston Marathon Bomber is a White Man" from Salon o Comments made by various democrat senators and congressmen and women o Comments made by various administration sources o Comments made by various commentators on CNN, MSNBC, CBS, NBC and NBC As far as being bedridden, not yet. I guess I am just an average American who feels the need to be informed. I know this is a difficult concept for you to grasp, which probably gives some insight into some of your responses. "In your heart you know he is right." The Frogg

Quite frankly, I believe the days of the old are coming back and T will be a $100 PPS within the next 18 months. Last week I began liquidating all my stocks and since Friday, 100% of my portfolio is withT. To hell with all the manipulated bios and tech stocks. You can't stop the giants. Every since the breakup of T, they have been coming back bigger and stronger! STRONG BUY!

Message.Title: OFF TOPIC POSTING
Message.Msg: Every large cap Yahoo msg bd has off topic left and right sniping at each other. Many people who own T check board but don't post. It's all OK, pumpers, shorts and off topic. I'm so glad I"m living in the USA. I'm proud SF vet, 5h SFG 1959 -1964

Topic.Title: Possible MSM interview with DHS Secretary:

Message.Msg: And there you have it, a poor misguided drone of the left, who has confused "critical thought" with the recitation of DNC talking points. Very sad, but this is still a free country, and everyone is still entitled to their own beliefs, even when those beliefs are those of his or her master. Yes my friends, the plantation of the left is alive and well in the democrat party. Probably not surprising when you consider the democrat party's history: o The party of slavery o The party of "Jim Crow" o The party of the KKK o The party of segregation o The party of eugenics and forced racial sterilization I could go on, but the history of the democrat party and their progressive cousins is quite famous. Also not surprising is that when the only thoughts the slave is allowed to have are those of the master, asking for a sense of history is probably really asking for too much. "In your hearts you know he is right." The Frogg

@xhoo. I like your enthusiasm. Be prepared to get blasted for making a statement like that. The Troll and troublemaker patrol will condemn you and call you every name in the book for even THINKING like that. I'd like nothing better than to see your prophecy come true, but I think most stock holders like myself and others would be satisfied to see half that projection met. I believe we het a stronger earnings report than VZ turned in. However, for some reason T rarely jumps as much as VZ does with similar reports. We'll see come Tuesday. Once again, disregard all the krap that you may receive. The easiest way to not have to deal with the Torwilligers and other nutcases is to simply use the ignore feature. Spare yourself the aggravation by rendering them invisible. Disclosure: Strong buy for some time to come!

Tis a might optimistic you are lad! As I recall, did T not hid a high in the 90's some 18 years or so ago? The market view t as a bid of an income and an equity play as does the market view its' peers. While 100 seems a might bit aggressive, viewing t as a growth/divi/equity play is in order. 18 months though - nah! much too aggressive, yet nice thinking.
Ya think little wicky will go after him as ricky or his new moniker rentfree?

Topic.Title: Possible MSM interview with DHS Secretary:

Message.Msg: Ah rentfree, such a breath of ricky fresh air. How are those section 8 rent payments workin for yee? Ya musta missed out on reading the democratic fatform this year - didn't you read about those transfer payments heading your way and increased taxes on the frogg for the frogg and his kind to support yee?

Your points are well taken Zon. There really isn't that much going on to have VZ surge as it did. The only other factor I can think of is VZ lurking in the background. I would think the added debt it would take for VZ to pull off the wireless buyout would dampen buying. VOD ain't giving it away as you know. Maybe by tomorrow, some of the more astute board members will chime in with their opinions. Weekends aren't exactly a hot spot of activity on the T board. Then again, the NBA playoffs began and are front and center. I'm dialed into the playoffs. The trusty ipad does send audible alerts, so I don't miss a beat here while following he action. Loyal San Antonio Spur fan fom the ABA days. Great to see them smack the arrogant LA Fakers down in game one. Looking forward to them winning a 5th league championship for the greatest power forward of all-time. Tim Duncan. And yes fans, that means they can beat Miami. Hopefully Wilkie will add his two cents on the quarterly report when he advises the board of his latest option play. I always enjoy his posts. He just needs to update that ADP. Last time he wrote about it, he was down from 300 bucks a day to 47.
I also love T and similar to you have a huge % of my portfolio in it, but you're nuts. 18 months till $100 ?? Relax.

I really like it when you pretend like you are a leprechaun. It would be fun to have you climb in me pocket..(??) and we could go to a "gunshow"..together and eat cotton candy until we "vomit"..(grins)..Arrrr.."me" likes to play PIRATE (!!)

Topic.Title: Possible MSM interview with DHS Secretary:

Message.Msg: I can see you pulling at the taut leash that Marjorie and Robert keep you on...trying to get to the edge of the property line. The wind rustles you little, girlish running shorts and your bony fists are clenched, you're yelling, yelling, yelling into the wind. Worthless, worn out, ignorant, bigoted, incontinent old fool. Time to exit stage right.
